Sentencas: Sm and Sr co-doped ceria-based electrolyte with compositions of Ce-0.8(Sm1-xSrx)(0.2)O2-delta (x = 0, 0.3, 0.5, 0.7) are synthesized and investigated with the aim of improving the electrical properties of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-delta.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ by Sr addition

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD) and electron microscope (SEM and TEM) techniques are employed to characterize the microstructure of powders and sintered pellets.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ by Sr addition

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity has been examined by the A.C. impedance spectroscopy in air.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ by Sr addition

Sentencas: The Ce-0.8(Sm0.7Sr0.3)(0.2)O2-delta exhibits the highest bulk conductivity among the series, which can be mainly ascribed to the increase of oxygen vacancy concentration.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ by Sr addition

Sentencas: The specific grain-boundary conductivities are observed to increase with the Sr doping content up to x = 0.5.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ by Sr addition

Sentencas: Further increase in Sr concentration will lead to reduced specific grain-boundary conductivities.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ by Sr addition

Sentencas: The total conductivities of all Sm and Sr co-doped ceria are higher than that of Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ by Sr addition

Sentencas: The results indicate that Sr co-doping opens a new avenue to improve ionic conductivity in Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ by Sr addition
Enhanced ionic conductivity of Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ by Sr addition
